message_1: What is the maximum amount of potassium chloride (KCl) that can be dissolved in 100 mL of water at 25°C?
message_2: The solubility of potassium chloride (KCl) in water at 25°C is approximately 34 grams per 100 mL of water. Therefore, the maximum amount of KCl that can be dissolved in 100 mL of water at 25°C is 34 grams.
